>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/rotate-credentials/{user_email}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to rotate a user's credentials and generate new ones.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"user_email","required":true,"description":"The email address of the user you want to operate on."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
